node.html: Architected a multimodal recommendation system to enhance movie discovery and recommendation experience for users.

frontmatter.title: SearchXpert: Distributed Web Crawler and Search Engine

node.html: Constructed data ingestion pipeline using pySpark, Kafka and leveraged NLP for indexing and search engine development.
Analysed global electricity production statistics from 2010-2022 to identify trends by fuel type and examined the relationship between electricity generation and economic growth.
Designed an interactive user-friendly web application to manage operations such as POS transactions and CRM.
Developed a deep learning model to automatically classify lateral cephalogram x-ray images into CVS stages to assist in orthodontic diagnosis and growth prediction.
Designed and developed a custom CNN architecture for determining the bone age of a non-dominant wrist x-ray, which would help doctors evaluate how fast or slowly a childâ€™s skeleton is maturing.
A multithreaded HTTP server in Java that handles concurrent client requests for resources and provides appropriate HTTP responses and server logs.
An e-commerce website with user authentication, product listings, shopping cart, and order management functionality.
An interactive review analytics web dashboard for visualizing product review sentiment, keywords, and metadata through various plots, graphs, and tables using the Plotly Dash framework.
Developed an AI-powered conversational chatbot using TensorFlow and NLP to address common college-related queries of students and automate responses to frequently asked questions.
Analyzed satellite imagery to derive vegetation and moisture indices including NDVI, EVI, and NDWI for environmental monitoring.
A web app built on Flask that lets users upload images and download the compressed image. Uses Huffman Coding to compress the bits of each pixel generated using MinHeaps in C.
